original_text: At the end of every three years, bring all the tithes of that year’s produce and store it in your towns,
korean_text: 매 삼 년 끝에 그 해 소산의 십분의 일을 다 내어 네 성읍에 저축하여

sentences.original_text: At the end of every three years,
bring all the tithes of that year's produce
and store it in your towns,
